Post office: Express Mail and special delivery only; main post office open at 33d Street and Eighth Avenue. Banks: Optional. Parking: Alternate-side rules suspended. Sanitation: Regular garbage pickups and recycling. No street cleaning. Schools: Closed. Financial markets: Closed. Transportation: Buses, subways, L.I.R.R. and Metro-North on regular schedule.
